films.title: The Giant Gila Monster
films.description: A giant lizard terrorizes a rural Texas community and a heroic teenager attempts to destroy the creature.

films.title: Manos: The Hands Of Fate
films.description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

films.title: Plan 9 from Outer Space
films.description: Aliens resurrect dead humans as zombies and vampires to stop humanity from creating the Solaranite, a bomb that would destroy the universe.

films.title: Troll 2
films.description: A young boy discovers that he and his family are the targets of vegetarian goblins who are trying to transform them into plants.
